verses.english: The Prophet frowned and turned away
verses.hausa: Yã game huska kuma ya jũya bãya.

verses.english: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].
verses.hausa: Sabõda makãho yã je masa.

verses.english: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified
verses.hausa: To, me ya sanar da kai cẽwa watakila shi ne zai tsarkaka.

verses.english: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?
verses.hausa: Ko ya tuna, dõmin tunãwar ta amfane shi?

verses.english: As for he who thinks himself without need,
verses.hausa: Amma wanda ya wadãtu da dũkiya.

verses.english: To him you give attention.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kai kuma ka ɗora bijira zuwa gare shi!

verses.english: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.
verses.hausa: To, me zai cũce ka idan bai tsarkaka ba?

verses.english: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]
verses.hausa: Kuma, amma wanda ya zomaka yana gaugãwa.

verses.english: While he fears [Allah],
verses.hausa: Alhãli shĩ yanã jin tsõrõn Allah.

verses.english: From him you are distracted.
verses.hausa: Kai kuma kã shagala ga barinsa!

verses.english: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;
verses.hausa: A'aha! Lalle ne, wannan tunãtarwa ce.

verses.english: So whoever wills may remember it.
verses.hausa: Sabõda wanda ya so ya tunaShi (Allah).

verses.english: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,
verses.hausa: (Tunãtarwa ce) ta cikin littafai abãban girmamãwa,

verses.english: Exalted and purified,
verses.hausa: Abãban ɗaukakãwa, abãban tsarkakẽwa.

verses.english: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,
verses.hausa: A cikin hannãyen mala'iku marubũta.

verses.english: Noble and dutiful.
verses.hausa: Mãsu daraja, mãsu ɗã'a ga Allah.

verses.english: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.
verses.hausa: An la'ani mutum (kafiri). Mẽ yã yi kãfircinsa!

verses.english: From what substance did He create him?
verses.hausa: Daga wane abu, (Allah) Ya halitta shi?

verses.english: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;
verses.hausa: Daga ɗigon maniyyi, Ya halitta shi sa'an nan Ya ƙaddarã shi (ga halaye).

verses.english: Then He eased the way for him;
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, hanyarsa ta fita Ya sauƙaƙe masa.

verses.english: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, Ya matar da shi sai Ya sanya shi a cikin kabari.

verses.english: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, idan Ya so lalle ne zai tãyar da shi.

verses.english: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.
verses.hausa: Haƙĩƙa bai i da aikata abin da Allah Ya umurce shi ba (lõkacin sanya shi a cikin kabari).

verses.english: Then let mankind look at his food -
verses.hausa: To, mutum ya dũba zuwa ga abincinsa.

verses.english: How We poured down water in torrents,
verses.hausa: Lalle ne Mũ, Mun zuo ruwa, zubõwa.

verses.english: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, Muka tsattsãge ƙasa tsattsagewa.

verses.english: And caused to grow within it grain
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, Muka tsirar da ƙwaya, a cikinta.

verses.english: And grapes and herbage
verses.hausa: Da inabi da ciyãwa.

verses.english: And olive and palm trees
verses.hausa: Da zaitũni da itãcen dabĩno.

verses.english: And gardens of dense shrubbery
verses.hausa: Da lambuna, mãsu yawan itãce.

verses.english: And fruit and grass -
verses.hausa: Da 'yã'yan itãcen marmari, da makiyãyã ta dabbõbi.

verses.english: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.
verses.hausa: Domin jin dãɗi a gare ku, ku da dabbobinku.

verses.english: But when there comes the Deafening Blast
verses.hausa: To, idan mai tsãwa (busa ta biyu) ta zo.

verses.english: On the Day a man will flee from his brother
verses.hausa: Rãnar da mutum yake gudu daga ɗan'uwansa.

verses.english: And his mother and his father
verses.hausa: Da uwarsa da ubansa.

verses.english: And his wife and his children,
verses.hausa: Da mãtarsa da ɗiyansa.

verses.arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
verses.english: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.
verses.hausa: Ga kõwane mutum daga cikinsu, a rãnar nan akwai wani sha'ani da ya ishe shi.

verses.english: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -
verses.hausa: Wasu huskõki, a rãnar nan, mãsu haske ne.

verses.english: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.
verses.hausa: Mãsu dãriya ne, mãsu bushãra.

verses.english: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.
verses.hausa: Wasu huskõki, a rãnar nan, akwai ƙũra a kansu.

verses.english: Blackness will cover them.
verses.hausa: Baƙi zai rufe su.

verses.english: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.
verses.hausa: Waɗannan sũ ne kãfirai fãjirai (ga ayyukansu).
